entry.title: [ANN] METAmarket - Trustless Federated Marketplaces
entry.summary: The email conversation between Melvin Carvalho and Marc D. Wood on May 1, 2015, reveals the concept of software for creating markets with variable levels of privacy and censorship resistance. The project is built on top of Bitcoin Core and Bitmessage, which is similar to the work Satoshi was putting into the core before he left. However, Marc clarifies that this is not the same project as Satoshi's original plan for a bitcoin marketplace and he is not Satoshi.
